snippet: For nearly two weeks now, on-site teams have been charting the extent of the damage to historic buildings caused by two strong earthquakes in the Emilia-Romagna region on a disaster map that continues to grow.
lead_paragraph: For nearly two weeks now, on-site teams have been charting the extent of the damage to historic buildings caused by two strong earthquakes in the Emilia-Romagna region on a disaster map that continues to grow.

headline.main: Italy Tries to Fathom Roster of Damage
headline.print_headline: Italy Tries to Fathom Roster of Damage
